meanings.definition: A person or animal resulting from inbreeding.
meanings.sent1: The inbreds in the family had similar features due to inbreeding.
meanings.sent2: The inbreds were prone to genetic disorders because of their close relatives mating.
meanings.sent3: The inbreds at the pet show looked like twins!
meanings.sent4: The inbreds in the village formed a close-knit community.
meanings.sent5: The inbreds in the zoo were a unique sight for visitors.

meanings.definition: To breed by mating closely related individuals.
meanings.sent1: Farmers inbreed certain plants to develop new varieties.
meanings.sent2: Some animal breeders choose to inbreed for specific traits.
meanings.sent3: The gardener decided to inbreed the roses for a colorful garden.
meanings.sent4: Inbreeding the livestock led to a stronger but smaller herd.
meanings.sent5: The scientist wanted to inbreed the fish for a research project.

meanings.sent1: The inbreds traits were evident in the family tree.
meanings.sent2: The inbreds genetic makeup was a topic of discussion among researchers.
meanings.sent3: The inbreds family reunion was full of inside jokes!
meanings.sent4: The inbreds history of the town was well-known.
meanings.sent5: The inbreds characteristics were passed down through generations.
